section.name: The Targets page
section.p: In the left frame all targets and their dependency tree are listed. Select a target from that list to display detailed information on that target in the right frame.

td.p: The Targets page of the Pustefix editor.

tr.td: Box No. 1 shows the parents of this target. Every virtual target has a XML and a XSL parent which are both listed here. You can click on one of these parents to have it displayed instead of the current target.
Box No. 2 lists the parameters for the target which are used for the XSLT transformation.
Box No. 3 shows all pages which use the current target. Clicking on such a page will display it in the Pages page.
Box No. 4 lists all includes which are used by the current target. To edit an include click on it and it will be opened in the Includes page.
Box No. 5 shows all images which are used by the current target. To edit an image click on it and it will be opened in the Images page.
Box No. 6 shows the whole content of the current target.
